nodes.text: The Dornean was a species native to planet Dornea. The Dorneans designed the Braha'tok-class gunship, a gunship class manufactured by the Dornean Braha'ket Fleetworks Conglomerate to protect their homeworld from the Galactic Empire. A number of these gunships came to aid the Rebel Alliance, notably after Dornea joined the faction following the Battle of Yavin.

The Dornean species was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars Encyclopedia of Starfighters and Other Vehicles, written by Landry Q. Walker. In Star Wars Legends, the species first appeared in the 1996 novel Before the Storm, written by Michael P. Kube-McDowell.
